channel.title: Question
channel.description: Do you think the players of runescape have wore every single combination of every item in the game? Like a bronze helm, iron scimitar, bandos tassets, etc.

item.title: Question
item.dc:creator: @reyx7 reyx7
item.description:
@reyx7 wrote:

[quote=“gravenfire23, post:14, topic:404308”][quote author=drubrkletern link=topic=501354.msg3669145#msg3669145 date=1310791320]

No.

No one has ever put on a dragon med helm with a black (t) platebody and an accuracy ammy with an iron dagger (p+) and 3rd age legs with boots (red), default gloves, a quest cape, 291 mith arrows §, a tzhaar shield, and a ring of life.

Pwned just did that naow

I doubt u have all that, so pics or it didn’t happen.

No1 has ever worn 3rd age plate, 3rd age druid robe legs, boots of color (stronghold shit), sandles, white phat, default gloves, adamant shield (spikes), ammy of ghost speak, mith spear §, bronze defender.

How can you wear sandles and boots at the same time? plus i think spears are two handed.

he might mean the hasta (I think its one handed)
[/quote]
Not sure about hastas never used one myself[/quote]
srry i meant that.

Read full topic

item.title: Question
item.dc:creator: @reyx7 reyx7
item.description:
@reyx7 wrote:

Andrew Ferguson:

If you don’t include arrows (the amount of them I mean) I’m pretty sure they have, clue scrolls will help a lot with that.

Clue scrolls don’t call for santas with addy legs (g) and a 3rd age range top

I could go on with the ridiculous combinations.
